settings.text: If you don't absolutely love your item(s) from Route One Apparel, send them back within 30 days of receipt for easy returns & exchanges on all qualifying* domestic orders. All you need to cover is the return shipping - we take care of the rest. We accept returns on your original form of payment for a minimum $6.00 restocking fee. Store credit and exchanges have no fee.
* for unqualified returns and exchanges, please read "Qualifications" tab below
Returns must be sent back within 30 days of delivery.
Product must not have been worn, washed, or altered in any way.
No visible signs of use present including deodorant/cosmetic stains, perfume, scents, etc.
All applicable tags must be intact and the product returned in their original clear packaging.
The items must be mailed back with the original packing slip included.
We do not accept returns on final sale items, discounted items, jewelry, intimate items, and exclusive run items.

settings.a_anchor_info: Submit a return or exchange request within 30 days of receiving your order. Choose from exchange, two return options; store credit or a refund to the original payment method.
settings.b_anchor_info: An unpaid shipping label will be sent to you via email with return and exchange instructions. Returns and exchanges are processed within three days of being delivered at Route One Apparel.
settings.c_anchor_info: An email will be dispatched when your return or exchange is processed. If you are returning something, you will receive a full refund or store credit, depending on the option you chose in step one.

settings.text:
If you have received the wrong/damaged item, or if your order was incomplete, please notify us within 3 business days upon receiving the package. We will send you a pre-paid return label for the return.

If you have received a damaged item, or if your order was incomplete, please notify us within 3 business days upon receiving the package. We will send you a pre-paid return label for the return.

We do not refund for return shipping costs if you do not request a pre-paid return label as stated above.
Customers have 30 days to send back purchases made at RouteOneApparel.com. Returns postmarked after 30 days will be refused and sent back at the customer's expense.
